message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product, and I think it's worth considering a price of $18000. It's a great opportunity to get a high-quality item at a competitive price.
Thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate your generosity. I would like to counteroffer a price of $15000.

I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $15000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $16500. It's a fair price considering the product's value and quality.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the product's value, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $16000.

I'm still not willing to go as low as $16000. I'm willing to compromise a bit more, so I'm counteroffering at $17000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a great deal for you.
Thank you for your continued patience, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $16500.

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, but I'm still not willing to meet your price. I'm willing to make one more compromise, so I'm counteroffering at $17500. This is the final offer I'll make, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your efforts to reach a compromise, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $17000.

I'm not willing to go as low as $17000. I'm willing to make a final counteroffer, and I'm thinking of a price that's closer to the original offer, but still a compromise. I'm counteroffering at $18000. This is my last offer, and I hope we can finalize the deal.
